00022 #ifndef _DEBUGLISTENER_HPP
00023 #define _DEBUGLISTENER_HPP
00024 
00025 #include <xqilla/framework/XQillaExport.hpp>
00026 #include <xqilla/exceptions/XQException.hpp>
00027 #include <xercesc/util/XercesDefs.hpp>
00028 
00029 class StackFrame;
00030 class DynamicContext;
00031 class XQException;
00032 
00036 class XQILLA_API DebugListener {
00037 public:
00038   virtual ~DebugListener() {}
00039 
00040   virtual void start(const StackFrame *stack, const DynamicContext *context) {}
00041   virtual void end(const StackFrame *stack, const DynamicContext *context) {}
00042   virtual void enter(const StackFrame *stack, const DynamicContext *context) {}
00043   virtual void exit(const StackFrame *stack, const DynamicContext *context) {}
00044   virtual void error(const XQException &error, const StackFrame *stack, const DynamicContext *context) { throw error; }
00045 
00046   virtual bool doLazyEvaluation() const { return true; }
00047   virtual bool doFocusOptimizations() const { return true; }
00048 };
